Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Hevn::
       He stops for a moment in the lab to think about what weapon could use 
upgrading.  His melee weapons are well suited to his tastes and were already 
quite flexible in their use.  His ranged weapons however could probably use a 
power boost.  He places his arms on the table and makes his blasters pop out of 
their backs.  "So what did you want to ask me?"

--part1_a5.3ae4d649.2c10b91c_boundary
